title: Spaced Repetition and Interleaved Retrieval Strategies to Enhance Learning Efficiency

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental learning strategies and intermediate or higher language proficiency
context.additional_context: Efficient learning strategies in PBL (Project-Based Learning) environments for language proficiency improvement targeting office/administrative professionals.

learning_goals: Learners can improve long-term retention rates of language learning content by over 40% within six months using spaced repetition techniques
Learners can enhance language application skills in real-world work scenarios (presentations, report writing, etc.) by 30% through interleaved retrieval practice
Learners independently utilize spaced repetition and interleaved retrieval strategies at a frequency of over 80% during self-directed learning

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
